title: Provided that, where more than 50% of area of the Survey Number / Gat Number is covered within the above peripheral distance then the remaining whole of such Survey number / Gat number within one ownership shall be considered for development on payment of premium as above
clause_text: Provided that, where more than 50% of area of the Survey Number / Gat Number is covered within the above peripheral distance then the remaining whole of such Survey number / Gat number within one ownership shall be considered for development on payment of premium as above.
